    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbandonedShipCard
    Represents an "Abandoned Ship" card, a specific type of card with unique effects in the game.
    AbandonedShipCardASCIIFormatter
    The AbandonedShipCardASCIIFormatter class provides functionality to format an AbandonedShipCard as an ASCII art representation.
    AbandonedShipCreator
    The AbandonedShipCreator is a subclass of CardCreator responsible for creating instances of the AbandonedShipCard class.
    AbandonedShipDTO
    This is a Data Transfer Object (DTO) class representing the Abandoned Ship scenario.
    AbandonedStationCard
    Represents a specific type of card in the game denoted as "Abandoned Station".
    AbandonedStationCardASCIIFormatter
    The AbandonedStationCardASCIIFormatter class provides functionality to format an AbandonedStationCard into an ASCII art representation that fits within a 48-character wide and 15-line high textual display.
    AbandonedStationCreator
    The AbandonedStationCreator class represents an "Abandoned Station" card creator, which task is to create the actual object card.
    AbandonedStationDTO
    This is a DTO (Data Transfer Object) representing the Abandoned Station card case.
    AdventurePhase
     
    Alien
     
    AlienColor
    Enumeration representing the possible colors of an alien in the game.
    AnsiColor
    AnsiColor is an enumeration that provides constants representing ANSI color codes used for terminal text formatting.
    AnsiFont
    AnsiFont is an enumeration that provides constants representing ANSI font styles used for terminal text formatting.
    AnsiSpecial
    AnsiSpecial is an enumeration that provides constants for special ANSI terminal sequences and graphical characters.
    AnsiString
    AnsiString is a utility class that provides methods for printing strings to the terminal with ANSI color and font formatting.
    ApplyAbandonedShipEffectRequest
    Represents a request to apply the effect of an "Abandoned Ship" card within the game.
    ApplyAbandonedShipOngoingResponse
    Represents a response for applying the effects of an ongoing "Abandoned Ship" card in the game.
    ApplyAbandonedStationEffectRequest
    Represents a request to apply the effect of an abandoned station card in the game.
    ApplyAbandonedStationOngoingResponse
    Represents a response that applies the ongoing effects of an abandoned station card in the game.
    ApplyEpidemicEffectRequest
    Represents a request to apply the effects of an epidemic card within the game.
    ApplyMeteorShowerEffectRequest
    Represents a request to apply the effect of a meteor shower card in the game.
    ApplyMeteorShowerOngoingResponse
    Represents a response that applies the ongoing effect of a meteor shower in the game context.
    ApplyOpenSpaceOngoingResponse
    Represents the response indicating the ongoing effect of an Open Space card within the game.
    ApplyOpenSpaceRequest
    Represents a request to apply an open space effect in the game.
    ApplyPirateEffectRequest
    Represents a request to apply a "Pirate Effect" on the given Card.
    ApplyPirateOngoingResponse
    Represents a response that applies the ongoing
    ApplyPlanetsEffectRequest
    Represents a request to apply the effect of a specific card related to the "Planets Effect" in the game.
    ApplyPlanetsOngoingResponse
    Represents a response indicating the ongoing application of a planetary effect in the game.
    ApplySlaversEffectRequest
    Represents a specific type of request to apply the "Slavers Effect" in a game.
    ApplySlaversOngoingResponse
    Represents a response indicating the ongoing effect of a Slavers card within the game.
    ApplySmugglersEffectRequest
    This class represents a request to apply the effect of a smuggler's card within the game.
    ApplySmugglersOngoingResponse
    Represents a response that applies the ongoing effects of the Smugglers card in the game.
    ApplyStellarSpaceDustEffectRequest
    Represents a request to apply the Stellar Space Dust effect to a card in the game.
    ApplyStellarSpaceDustOngoingResponse
    Represents a response that carries the application of ongoing effects caused by the Stellar Space Dust event in the game.
    ApplyWarZoneEffectRequest
    Represents a request to apply a War Zone effect using a specified card.
    ApplyWarZoneEffectResponseOngoing
    Represents a response that notifies the client of an ongoing War Zone effect during the game.
    ApplyWarZoneProjectileOngoingResponse
    Represents a response triggering the ongoing effect of a War Zone projectile in the game.
    BaseDeck
    Abstract base class implementing the Deck interface, providing core functionality for card decks in Galaxy Trucker.
    BatteryManager
    This class is part of the ship class, and its used to control the batteries added on the ship tiles.
    BatteryStorageCreator
    The BatteryStorageCreator class represents a "Battery Storage" tile creator.
    BatteryStorageTile
    This type of tile will represent the battery storages
    BuildingShipPhaseLevel2Controller
     
    BuildingShipPhaseTryLevelController
     
    CabinCreator
    The CabinCreator class represents a "Cabin" tile creator.
    CabinCrewDTO
    This is a DTO (Data Transfer Object) for the ???
    CabinManager
    This class is part of the ship class, and its used to control the cabin tiles logic.
    CabinTile
    The class represent the cabin tile that will be inserted in the ship.
    CalculateFirePowerResponse
    Represents a response sent during the adventure phase of the game to calculate the firepower in a war zone scenario.
    CalculateThrustPowerResponse
    Represents a response received during the calculation of the thrust power in the game.
    CannonBaseTile
    This class represents the base functionality for cannon tiles.
    CannonCreator
    The CannonCreator class represents a "Cannon" tile creator.
    CannonTile
    This class represents a single cannon tile.
    Card
    Represents an abstract card in the game.
    CardCreator
    The CardCreator is an abstract class representing a card creator.
    CardParser
    A parser for converting JSON data into Card objects.
    CardStack
    Represents a stack of cards with a maximum capacity.
    CargoColor
    Represents the possible colors assigned to cargo in the game.
    CargoHoldCreator
    The CargoHoldCreator class represents a "Cargo Hold" tile creator.
    CargoHoldTile
    The class represent the cargo holds that will be inserted in the ship
    CargosManager
    This class is part of the ship class, and its used to manage the cargos.

    CLIBanners
    This class contains the ASCII art for the game's CLI
    CLICommands
    The CLICommands class provides static utility methods for managing terminal behavior such as cursor position manipulation, screen clearing, and terminal size adjustments using ANSI escape codes.

    Represents a request to draw a card in the game.

    Represents a response for drawing a smugglers card in the game.

    The EpidemicCreator class represents an "Epidemic" card creator, which task is to create the actual object card.

    This is a DTO (Data Transfer Object) for the Epidemic card case
    ExceptionHandler
    This interface defines methods for handling different types of exceptions that may occur during the execution of a client application.
    FinishedCardEffectResponse
    Represents a response that indicates the completion of a card effect during the gameplay.
    FireShot
    The FireShot class represents a fire shot in the game.
    FlipHourGlassRequest
     
    FlippedTileDeck
    This class represent the tiles that were seen by a player but not used on their ship.

    Represents the different phases in a game lifecycle.

    This is a General DTO (Data Transfer Object)
    Gui
     
    GuiController
     
    GuiExceptionHandler
    This class is a singleton implementation of the ExceptionHandler interface for handling exceptions in a Graphical User Interface (GUI) context.
    GuiHandler
    This class is used to handle the response received by the server (GUI)
    GuiSceneController
     
    Handler
    The Handler interface defines the contract for processing various types of responses received from a server during the execution of the game.
    Hourglass
    This class represent the hourglass that is used during the ship building phase.
    HourglassLevel2
    This class extends the basic functions of the hourglass adding the method that resets the timer after a player chooses to do it.
    HourglassManager
    This manager is used to implement the singleton design pattern and a pseudo farm

    Level2Deck
    Represents a deck of cards for Level 2 gameplay in Galaxy Trucker.
    LevelTwoShip
    This class represents a level two player's ship using a graph structure.
    LoginController
     
    LoginRequest
    This class is the first request that a new player joining the game session sends to the server, that of asking for a login service
    Map
    This class represent the map where the players move during the game, it is represented with an array so it's easier keeping track of the positions and with the dimension and startingPositions we can differentiate between the first flight mode and the regular one.
    MapManager
     
    MatchStartedResponse
     
    MenuController
    The MenuController class handles the preparation phase of the game.

    The SendFirePowerRequest class represents a request sent by a player to calculate the lowest fire power based on a specific card.

    Ship
     
    ShipCell
    This class represent the basic unit for creating the player's ship In this class we have the connection to the tile, with the adjacent tiles and a boolean for checking if the cell can contain a tile
    ShipCreator
     
    ShipCrewPlacer
    This class manages logic to add crew to the cabin tiles present on the ship
    ShipLayout
    This class manages the logic to add tiles, remove tiles, and handles the validation part too
    ShipMatrixConfig
    This class defines the structure of the matrix for the ships used in the game (try level and level2)
    ShipStats
    this class is used to calculate and save stats everytime something gets added
